meanings.definition: To forbid or prohibit in advance.
meanings.sent1: The teacher prebidden talking during the test.
meanings.sent2: She always prebidden him from going out after dark.
meanings.sent3: The cat prebidden the mouse from entering its territory.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds prebidden any outdoor activities.
meanings.sent5: The sign prebidden entry into the construction site.

meanings.definition: Something that has been forbidden or prohibited in advance.
meanings.sent1: The list of prebiddens included bringing pets to school.
meanings.sent2: He found out about the prebidden party too late.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was a prebidden mystery waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent4: The ancient artifact was a prebidden relic from a lost civilization.
meanings.sent5: The forbidden fruit was the ultimate prebidden temptation.
